examples.input:
↹ data•revenue
⊕ analyze => trends
⊕ forecast => future
Σ insights + charts
examples.label: analysis
examples.explanation: This prompt analyzes revenue data and forecasts trends

examples.input:
↹ reviews•product
⊕ sentiment>0.5 => positive
⊕ sentiment<0.5 => negative
Σ analysis + score
examples.label: sentiment
examples.explanation: This prompt analyzes product review sentiment

examples.input:
↹ data•quarterly
⊕ aggregate => summary
⊕ format => report
Σ document + metrics
examples.label: reporting

examples.input:
↹ document•en
⊕ translate => es
⊕ verify => accuracy
Σ translation + score
examples.label: translation
examples.explanation: This prompt translates from English to Spanish

examples.input:
↹ code•python
⊕ lint => issues
⊕ refactor => clean
Σ code + metrics
examples.label: code
examples.explanation: This prompt lints and refactors Python code
